content: As a required boss fight, you'll encounter Kang-Jin Loong when attempting to infiltrate the small temple on the frozen lake in Mirrormere at the end of the Snowhill Path.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Kang-Jin_Loong.md", within the section "Kang-Jin Loong" and the sub-section "Where to Find Kang-Jin Loong". The content is presented below:

As a required boss fight, you'll encounter Kang-Jin Loong when attempting to infiltrate the small temple on the frozen lake in Mirrormere at the end of the Snowhill Path.
